item.title: FDA approves weight loss drug Zepbound to treat obstructive sleep apnea
item.description: The FDA said studies have shown that by aiding weight loss, Zepbound improves sleep apnea symptoms in some patients.

item.title: Netflix is dreaming of a glitch-free Christmas with 2 major NFL games set
item.description: It comes weeks after Netflix's attempt to broadcast live boxing between Jake Paul and Mike Tyson was rife with technical glitches.
